title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook ground beef with onions and garlic. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Serve over cooked spaghetti.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Saute onions, add curry powder. Add chicken, tomatoes, and coconut milk. Simmer until chicken is cooked.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a separate pan, cook pancetta until crisp. In a bowl, whisk eggs, grated parmesan, and black pepper. Drain spaghetti, add to the pan with pancetta, then pour egg mixture over spaghetti. Toss until coated and creamy.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef in a pan, add taco seasoning. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: Mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
instructions: Heat oil in a wok, add minced garlic and ginger. Stir in mixed vegetables. In a bowl, mix soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, brown sugar, and cornstarch. Pour over vegetables, stir until sauce thickens and vegetables are cooked.
